name: Character Sheet
description:
A great helper app to keep track of your tabletop RPG character data.

Intended for people familiar with tabletop RPG games, this app has several features to help you with tracking your character's data:
- Keep track of all those numbers (all attributes in one convenient place)
- Automatically update data (all attributes are synced automatically when modified)
- Dice roller (a fancy way to roll any combination of dice you want)
- Journal (with the option to enter your own custom entries and features)
- Inventory (keep track of weight, gold, and several common items)
- Custom Shop (create your own custom items and share them between characters)
- Magic (track Mana by Value or Slots, and use notes for spells)
- Multiple characters support
- No ads! (because that would ruin your immersion)
